name: True Depth
description: TrueDepth,  The Meyland Company hired you to investigate the missing persons from Operation True Dept.  Without amplification, you are dropped at the last known location, with only a camera, the Capture Aparature Register Lens (aka C.A.R.L.).  With this (single-time-use) camera you can take special photos that, thanks to Meyland's new technology, can show events from up to 10 years ago.  By taking pictures of your surroundings, you will find out what happened to Team Alpha, the team that mysteriously went missing 10 years ago.
